Text: So long Cc PST Hey yall as most of you would probably know by now I have chosen to leave Enron to pursue other opportunities Its been a good time years with great experiences both in NorthSouth America and in Europe Id like to use this email to thank everybody for their good work and friendship In particular in order of appearance Dung Tran Jon Doyle Dave Ramm Natalie Halich Roberto Silveira and Rick Waddell have been great sources of learning and leadership Other opportunities means exactly that not quite sure what the next adventure will be but it wont be boring I encourage you to reply with your personal email etc so that we can keep in touch All the best Christian Phone homenumber London Permanent POBox Christian Kvorning West Clay PMB Houston TX USA Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at

Re Hey as they say in SwedenHey Mark as they used to say in London Youre right i came down here in the beginning of the month and I am now slowly setting up shop down here in wonderful Rio de Janeiro Things are going well but the jobsearch is not gonna be easy now that we are facing a worldwide recession I saw that Enron took a huge beating today after some SEC inquiry Nasty stuff if you ask me From being the darling on Wall Street we are now back to being the ugly duckling old Danish fairytale of course I can understand that your are happy about being out of EBS cos it seemed like you were often stuck between a rock and a hard place Maybe the pipeline business is a little safermaybe Anyway Id like to say that it was also a great pleasure to work with you its refreshing to work with somebody stable smart and trustworthy I did meet up with Martin briefly as he joined in for my goodbye party in London His email address is mailto He also has quite an uphill struggle in front of him looking to start up a sort of recruiting company that exploits the differences in wages between eastern and western telecomengineers With wife and three kids waiting at home its not a position that I envy him frankly Well young man Take care with strange looking envelopes containing white sugar etc If you feel that its getting too crazy up there you know that you will always have a place to stay in calm Rio de Janeiro cK Christian Kvorning Celular mailto Original Message Follows From McConnell Mark To Subject Hey as they say in Sweden Date Wed Oct Christian Hows it going in Brazil I know you are happy to be back I transferred out of EBS and got back into the gas business Im working for the pipeline group The people here are very nice and Im glad to be back in this industry Although I must say that I will miss London and working with people like yourself I got a message from Martin Joergansen the other day Do you happen to know his email address Please let me know I hope all is well down south Mark Mark McConnell Transwestern Pipeline Company office cell fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material
